FROM 30NW IGB-30E IGB-30ESE MEI-40N AEX-20NNE ELD-30NW IGB 
AREA EMBD TS MOV FROM 16010KT. TOPS TO FL370. CELLS MOV FROM 
11035KT. 
TS ASSOCD WITH TD CRISTOBAL. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 081255-081655 
AREA 1...FROM 50S YWG-INL-80NNE DLH-FSD-60SSW RAP-40N MOT-50S YWG 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM LIT-MSL-170S CEW-80ESE PSX-GGG-LIT 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. REFER 
TO MOST RECENT WTNT21 KNHC FROM NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER FOR 
DETAILS ON TD CRISTOBAL.
